articles.title: How Al Qaeda Chief Ayman Al-Zawahiri's Elimination Impacts India
articles.description: Al Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri, killed in a US strike in Afghanistan over the weekend, had for years tried to get into Kashmir with little or no success. However, his terror outfit has consistently threatened India, including once this year.
articles.content:
In April this year, he issued a statement after the hijab controversy.
